content: the petal bag is a lightweight decorative market-style bag designed to cradle fresh flowers or produce it s worked in the round from the base up using treble_crochet stitches and chain spaces to create an airy petal-like texture a braided tie and sturdy straps make it both functional and whimsical size one size strap length adjustable sample shown with 95 cm straps gauge not critical for this pattern for reference 4 treble_crochet and 2 chain-2 spaces = approx 4 in 10 cm in pattern stitch materials needed sugar n cream cotton yarn worsted weight / medium 4 5 0 mm crochet hook measuring tape scissors tapestry needle yarn used approx 70 90g total of sugar n cream cotton for bag + optional tie roughly 125 150 yards / 115 137 meters color options pattern works well in solid or multi-colored cotton yarns sample shown in jute
